abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews movie Hungry Hearts, directed by Saverio Costanzo and starring Adam Driver and Alba Rohrwacher.
lead_paragraph: Saverio Costanzo’s film stars Adam Driver and Alba Rohrwacher as a New York couple whose relationship takes a dark turn after the birth of their baby.

headline.main: Review: ‘Hungry Hearts,’ a Drama About Love and Obsession

snippet: Saverio Costanzo’s film stars Adam Driver and Alba Rohrwacher as a New York couple whose relationship takes a dark turn after the birth of their baby.
